document.full_text: japan saw some success in its race to avert disaster at a tsunami-damaged power plant, though minor radiation leaks underlined perils from the world's worst nuclear crisis since chernobyl 25 years ago.
document.title: japan says makes progress in nuclear crisis
lines_and_colors: japan saw some success in its race to avert disaster at a tsunami-damaged power plant, though minor radiation leaks underlined perils from the world's worst nuclear crisis since chernobyl 25 years ago.
